name: No Room to Move
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 45: Start with Nothing (Jam)

No Room to Move is a platformer in which you start out each level with only one platform and have to activate the rest to beat the level.

Controls: A and D/Left arrow and right arrow for left and right movement, space to jump, S/Down arrow to fall through platforms.

Music credits (CC0 licensed):

“Boss Battle #4” by nene: https://opengameart.org/content/boss-battle-4-8-bit-re-upload

“8bit Title Screen” by Joth: https://opengameart.org/content/8bit-title-screen
